mitmproxy/mitmproxy

intercept and inspect HTTP, HTTPS, and WebSocket traffic

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • CLI proxy for capturing and inspecting HTTP and WebSocket traffic
  • tunnel any traffic over websockets to bypass firewalls and proxies
  • turn mitmproxy traffic into OpenAPI specs automatically
  • capture and modify HTTP(S) traffic for apps and devices
  • Exposes local HTTP and WebSocket services to the internet
  • Captures and inspects network traffic on macOS
  • Proxy server for HTTP, SOCKS5, TCP, UDP, and more — works on lots of platforms
  • reverse proxy and forwarding tool with web UI, load balancing, SSL, and plugins
  • Web app scanner for automated and manual testing
  • Reverse proxy for Chrome DevTools protocol
